name: Mountain Mashdown
description:
We changed our entire game idea on Saturday since our original idea didn't fit the them enough - this meant that the work for this game was incredibly tight! We were still doing fundamental gameplay elements in the last hour, meaning we had 0 time to polish, balance or bugfix the game - so unfortunately it isn't quite up to what we would've liked - but nonetheless we're happy with the end result!

We were hoping to name the game something a little more different to our previous jam entries, but unfortunately due to time restraints, our placeholder name happened to turn into the final game name!

Programmed in Unity.

Developers:

- Aidan, Seb, Coach

Sound, Voices & Consulting:

- Perry

Gameplay & Design Advice:

- Judgedeath98
